subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Spike Lee, who assisted the Knicks with their free-agent presentations, says it was not happenstance that LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh ended up on the same team.
snippet: Spike Lee, who assisted the Knicks with their free-agent presentations, says it was not happenstance that LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh ended up on the same team.
